amendment.description: Amendment increases funding, by offset, to the Office of the Inspector General Operating Expenses account by $500,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding (by transfer) to the Office of the Inspector General Operationg Expenses account by $500,000.

action.text: Amendment (A017) offered by Ms. Brown, Corrine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown, Corrine amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
